message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it! I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer! I really appreciate it, but $150 is a bit out of my budget.  I'm willing to pay $80 for it.  Let me know what you think.
I understand that $150 is a bit steep for you, but I'm not willing to go as low as $80. How about we meet in the middle at $110?

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $110 is still more than I'm comfortable paying.  Since you're not willing to go lower than $110, I'll have to go with another seller who is offering the same product for $80. Good luck with your sale!
